title: How to Make a Surimi Crab Cucumber Salad

steps.headline: Lay the crab meat pieces over ice in a small bowl.
Drizzle the crab with olive oil and season with salt.
Make the sauce.
steps.description: In a blender, measure and add the salt, lime juice, water, ginger, chili, and mustard. Puree until smooth.

steps.headline: Pour the puree mixture into a bowl and slowly add the oils while mixing.
Spread a thin layer of the pureed sauce on the bottom of a cold bowl.
Add the seasoned crab and cucumber pieces in the bowl.
steps.description: Drizzle the remaining sauce on the top.

text: Lay the crab meat pieces over ice in a small bowl.  Drizzle the crab with olive oil and season with salt.  Make the sauce. In a blender, measure and add the salt, lime juice, water, ginger, chili, and mustard. Puree until smooth. Pour the puree mixture into a bowl and slowly add the oils while mixing.  Spread a thin layer of the pureed sauce on the bottom of a cold bowl.  Add the seasoned crab and cucumber pieces in the bowl. Drizzle the remaining sauce on the top.
